## Template type

The type definition for the template's default function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Template<T extends TemplateRenderProps> = (
  props: T
) => JSX.Element;
```

<b>References:</b> [TemplateRenderProps](./pages.templaterenderprops.md)
